item.title: About
item.description:
Hello!

  • I’m abel.
  • I’m a master’s student in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science and Technology.
  • My research focuses on Multi-Modal Information Extraction, like Visual Relation Detection.
  • My research skill is still relatively poor now.ğŸ˜…
  • Thank you for visiting.
